snippet: Relations between Iran and Canada, already at a low point, worsened Monday as Iran denounced a court ruling that froze Iranian government assets in Canada.
abstract: Relations between Iran and Canada worsen as Iran denounces Canadian court ruling that freezes Iranian government assets in country; relations were already at low point after Canada severed diplomatic ties in September.
lead_paragraph: Relations between Iran and Canada, already at a low point, worsened Monday as Iran denounced a court ruling that froze Iranian government assets in Canada.
